channel.title: How do I edit Starter Pack?
channel.description:
I want to add items to the starter pack. I know the code to add items, I just don't know where to find the area to add it to.
Much appreciated if you guys can help me out :D

item.title: How do I edit Starter Pack?
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”))
{
if (starter == 0)
{
addItem(995, 250000000);
addItem(1042, 1);
addItem(3140, 1);
addItem(4087, 1);
addItem(3204, 1);
addItem(392, 15000);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 20000);
addItem(555, 20000);
addItem(565, 20000);
addItem(556, 20000);
addItem(557, 20000);
addItem(560, 20000);
addItem(561, 20000);
addItem(562, 20000);
addItem(563, 20000);
addItem(566, 20000);
addItem(558, 20000);
sendMessage(“servername starter package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
}
else if (starter == 1)
{

			sendMessage("Sorry you gay fag.");
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is the GAYEST lil homo ever, everyone laugh at him!");

so go into your server file, then eddit client.java, and search for starter, and then you should see something like that. and just add them or what ever you want t do deletethe ones you dont want anymore and replace with your own ones.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit Starter Pack?

item.title: How do I edit Starter Pack?
item.dc:creator: @The_Skillers The Skillers
item.description:
@The_Skillers wrote:

go client.java and search for “starter” u see down there like this
addItem(3569, 1);
addItem(995, 50000);
addItem(561, 50);
addItem(554, 150);
explaining
addItem(3569, 1);
first code “3569” is item id (change it what u want)
and other “1” is amount like how many items it gives
then save , compile and run!

Read full topic
